description.english: Take out an enemy that's investigating an enemy body.
description.german: Neutralisiere einen Feind, der einen Körper untersucht.
description.koreana: 쓰러진 적을 조사하는 중인 적을 처리.
description.russian: Устраните врага, который исследует тело своего напарника.
description.spanish: Encárgate de un enemigo que esté investigando un cuerpo.
description.turkish: Bulduğu cesedi inceleyen bir düşmanın icabına bak.

description.english: Bait an enemy by talking nonsense, then take them out.
description.german: Locke einen Feind an, indem du Schwachsinn laberst und neutralisiere ihn darauf hin.
description.russian: Привлеките врага говоря бред, после чего нейтрализуйте их.
description.spanish: Atrae a un enemigo diciendo tonterías, y elimínalo.
description.turkish: Boş konuşarak bir düşmanın dikkatini çek ve icabına bak.

description.english: Bait an enemy with your microphone, then take them out.
description.german: Locke einen Feind an, indem du dein Mikrofon benutzt und neutralisiere ihn darauf hin.
description.koreana: 당신의 마이크로 직접 적을 유인해 처리.
description.russian: Привлеките врага говоря бред в микрофон, после чего нейтрализуйте их
description.spanish: Engaña a un enemigo usando tu micrófono, y después elimínalo.
description.turkish: Mikrofon kullanarak bir düşmanın dikkatini çek ve icabına bak.

description.english: Choke an enemy out.
description.german: Erdrossele einen Feind.
description.spanish: Ahoga a un enemigo hasta dejarlo noqueado.
description.turkish: Bir düşmanı boğarak etkisizleştir.

displayName.german: Tut mir leid für die Störung

description.english: Knock a startled enemy out
description.german: Knocke einen erschrockenen Feind aus.
description.spanish: Noquea a un enemigo alertado.
description.turkish: Korkmuş bir düşmanın icabına bak.

description.english: Knock an enemy out with a door bash.
description.german: Knocke einen Feind mit dem Eintreten einer Tür aus.
description.spanish: Noquea a un enemigo al patear una puerta.
description.turkish: Üzerine kapı tekmeleyerek bir düşmanı yere yık.

description.english: Kill someone with the shrapnel from a frag grenade.
description.german: Töte einen Feind mit dem Schrapnell einer Granate.
description.spanish: Mata a alguien con la metralla de una granada de fragmentación.
description.turkish: El bombasından fırlayan şarapnellerle bir düşmanı öldür.

description.english: Kill 3 enemies with guns under 5 seconds.
description.german: Töte 3 Feinde mit Schusswaffen in unter 5 Sekunden.
description.russian: Убейте 3 врагов используя огнестрельное оружие меньше чем за 5 секунд.
description.spanish: Mata a 3 enemigos en 5 segundos usando armas de fuego.
description.turkish: Ateşli silahlarla 5 saniyede 3 düşmanı öldür.

description.english: Kill 6 enemies with guns in under 5 seconds.
description.german: Töte 6 Feinde mit Schusswaffen in unter 5 Sekunden.
description.russian: Убейте 6 врагов используя огнестрельное оружие меньше чем за 5 секунд.
description.spanish: Mata a 6 enemigos en 5 segundos usando armas de fuego.
description.turkish: Ateşli silahlarla 5 saniyede 6 düşmanı öldür.

description.english: Kill 5 enemies with a shotgun in 10 seconds.
description.german: Töte 5 Feinde mit einer Schrotflinte in unter 10 Sekunden.
description.russian: Убейте 5 врагов при помощи дробовика за 10 секунд.
description.spanish: Mata a 5 enemigos con una escopeta en 10 segundos.
description.turkish: Pompalı tüfekle 10 saniyede 5 düşmanı öldür.

description.english: Kill 3 (or more) enemies with a single frag grenade.
description.german: Töte 3 Feinde (oder) mit einer Granate.
description.russian: Убейте 3 (или больше) врагов одной осколочной гранатой.
description.spanish: Mata a 3 enemigos o más con una única granada de fragmentación.
description.turkish: Tek el bombasıyla 3 (veya daha fazla) düşmanı öldür.

description.english: Kill 5 (or more) enemies with a single frag grenade.
description.german: Töte 5 Feinde (oder) mit einer Granate.
description.russian: Убейте 5 (или больше) врагов одной осколочной гранатой.
description.spanish: Mata a 5 enemigos o más con una única granada de fragmentación.
description.turkish: Tek el bombasıyla 5 (veya daha fazla) düşmanı öldür.

description.english: Kill 8 (or more) enemies with a single frag grenade.
description.german: Töte 8 Feinde (oder) mit einer Granate.
description.russian: Убейте 8 (или больше) врагов одной осколочной гранатой.
description.spanish: Mata a 8 enemigos o más con una única granada de fragmentación.
description.turkish: Tek el bombasıyla 8 (veya daha fazla) düşmanı öldür.

description.english: Have a flashbanged enemy accidentally kill his own friend.
description.german: Bringe einen, mit einer Blendgranate geblendeten, Feind seinen eigenen Freund zu töten.
description.koreana: 섬광폭음탄에 맞은 적이 동료를 사살하게 만들기.
description.russian: Позвольте ослеплённому врагу нечаянно пристрелить своего друга.
description.spanish: Haz que un enemigo cegado por una granada cegadora mate a su propio compañero.
description.turkish: Flaş bombasına maruz kalan bir düşmanın ekip arkadaşını öldürmesine sebep ol.

description.english: Neutralize someone while they are under the effect of a flashbang.
description.german: Neutralisiere einen Feind, während er von einer Blendgranate geblendet ist.
description.russian: Нейтрализуйте кого-нибудь пока они ослеплены светошумовой гранатой.
description.spanish: Neutraliza a un enemigo mientras está bajo el efecto de una granada cegadora.
description.turkish: Flaş bombasına maruz kalan bir düşmanı etkisizleştir.

description.english: Kill yourself with your own frag grenade.
description.german: Bringe dich selber, mit einer Granate, um.
description.spanish: Muere con tu propia granada de fragmentación.
description.turkish: Kendi el bomban yüzünden öl.

description.english: Have your frag grenade shrapnel kill you.
description.german: Sterbe von dem Schrapnell deiner eigenen Granate.
description.spanish: Muere a causa de la metralla de tu granada de fragmentación.
description.turkish: Kendi attığın el bombasından fırlayan şarapneller yüzünden öl.

description.english: Over-cook a frag grenade.
description.german: Überkoche eine Granate.
description.koreana: 격발시킨 수류탄이 터질 때 까지 손에 들고 있기.
description.spanish: Prepara durante demasiado tiempo una granada de fragmentación.
description.turkish: Pimini çektiğin el bombası elinde patlayana kadar bekle.

description.english: Over-cook a flash grenade.
description.german: Überkoche eine Blendgranate.
description.koreana: 격발시킨 섬광폭음탄이 터질 때 까지 손에 들고 있기
description.spanish: Prepara durante demasiado tiempo una granada cegadora.
description.turkish: Pimini çektiğin flaş bombası elinde patlayana kadar bekle.

description.english: Get killed by a door bash.
description.german: Sterbe von einem Feind, der eine Tür eintritt.
description.spanish: Muere a causa de que un enemigo patee la puerta contigo al otro lado.
description.turkish: Üzerine kapı tekmelenmesi sonucu öl.

description.english: Complete a level without being detected.
description.german: Beende ein Level, ohne entdeckt zu werden.
description.spanish: Completa un nivel sin ser detectado.
description.turkish: Düşman tarafından hiç fark edilmeden bir bölümü tamamla.

description.english: Complete a level without killing anyone.
description.german: Beende ein Level, ohne jemanden zu töten.
description.spanish: Completa un nivel sin matar a nadie.
description.turkish: Kimseyi öldürmeden bir bölümü tamamla.

description.english: Complete a level whilst using naught but the Taser.
description.german: Beende ein Level nur mit dem Taser.
description.spanish: Completa un nivel sin usar nada más que el Taser.
description.turkish: Sadece şok tabancası kullanarak bir bölümü tamamla.

description.english: Complete a level unarmed.
description.german: Beende ein Level unbewaffnet.
description.spanish: Completa un nivel desarmado.
description.turkish: Silahsız ve teçhizatsız, sadece çıplak ellerini kullanarak bir bölümü tamamla.

description.english: Complete a level whilst using naught but the Tranquilizer Rifle.
description.german: Beende ein Level nur mit dem Betäubungsgewehr.
description.russian: Пройдите уровень используя ничего кроме Транквилизатора.
description.spanish: Completa un nivel sin usar nada más que el Rifle Tranquilizante.
description.turkish: Sadece sakinleştirici tüfek kullanarak bir bölümü tamamla.

description.english: Finish 'Abandoned Complex' without killing anyone.
description.german: Beende das Level 'Verlassener Komplex' ohne jemanden zu töten.
description.koreana: '버려진 단지' 레벨을 아무도 죽이지 않고 완료.
description.russian: Пройдите уровень 'Заброшенный Комплекс' не убив никого.
description.spanish: Acaba el nivel 'Complejo Abandonado' sin matar a nadie.
description.turkish: Kimseyi öldürmeden 'Metruk Yerleşke' bölümünü tamamla.

description.english: Complete a level without taking any damage.
description.german: Beende ein Level, ohne Schaden zu nehmen.
description.spanish: Completa un nivel sin recibir daños.
description.turkish: Hiç hasar almadan bir bölümü tamamla.

description.english: Complete a level without saving once.
description.german: Beende ein Level, ohne ein einziges Mal zu speichern.
description.russian: Пройдите уровень не сохраняясь ни разу.
description.spanish: Completa un nivel sin guardar ni una vez.
description.turkish: İlerlemeni hiç kaydetmeden bir bölümü tamamla.

description.english: Kill the Degenerate.
description.german: Töte den Abschaum.
description.spanish: Mata al Degenerado.
description.turkish: Soysuz'u öldür.

description.english: Spare the Baker.
description.german: Verschone den Bäcker.
description.spanish: Deja vivir al Supervisor.
description.turkish: Fırıncı'yı bağışla.

description.english: Kill the Baker.
description.german: Töte den Bäcker.
description.spanish: Mata al Supervisor.
description.turkish: Fırıncı'yı öldür.

description.english: Finish the campaign with the Baker spared.
description.german: Beende die Kampagne mit dem Bäcker verschont.
description.spanish: Acaba la campaña dejando vivir al Supervisor.
description.turkish: Fırıncı'yı bağışlayarak ana hikâyeyi tamamla.

description.english: Finish the campaign with the Baker killed.
description.german: Beende die Kampagne mit dem Bäcker tot.
description.spanish: Acaba la campaña matando al Supervisor.
description.turkish: Fırıncı'yı öldürerek ana hikâyeyi tamamla.

description.english: Finish the campaign without using any weapons.
description.german: Beende die Kampagne, ohne irgendwelche Waffen benutzt zu haben.
description.russian: Пройдите режим кампании не используя никаких оружий.
description.spanish: Acaba la campaña sin usar armas.
description.turkish: Silahsız ve teçhizatsız, sadece çıplak ellerini kullanarak ana hikâyeyi tamamla.

description.english: Complete the game without killing a single enemy, unless when forced to.
description.german: Beende das Spiel, ohne einen einzigen Feind zu töten, es sei denn, es wird dazu gezwungen.
description.koreana: 반드시 죽여야 하는 적 외에는 누구도 죽이지 않고 게임 클리어.
description.russian: Пройдите режим кампании не убив никого, не считая случаев, когда вы принуждены это сделать.
description.spanish: Completa el juego sin matar a ni un solo enemigo al que no estés forzado a matar.
description.turkish: Zorunda kalmadıkça kimseyi öldürmeden ana hikâyeyi tamamla.

description.english: Kill everyone throughout the campaign.
description.german: Töte jeden in der Kampagne.
description.spanish: Mata a todo el mundo en la campaña.
description.turkish: Hikâye boyunca yaşayan herkesi öldür.

description.english: Complete the game on the 'Easy' difficulty.
description.german: Beende das Spiel auf dem 'Einfach' Schwierigkeitsgrad.
description.spanish: Completa el juego en la dificultad 'Fácil'.
description.turkish: Ana hikâyeyi 'Kolay' zorlukta tamamla.

description.english: Complete the game on the 'True' difficulty.
description.german: Beende das Spiel auf dem 'Getreu' Schwierigkeitsgrad.
description.spanish: Completa el juego en la dificultad 'Fíel'.
description.turkish: Ana hikâyeyi 'Esas' zorlukta tamamla.

description.english: Complete the game with ammo auto-grab disabled.
description.german: Beende das Spiel ohne dem automatischem Munitionsaufheben.
description.koreana: 자동 탄환 습득을 해제한 상태로 게임 클리어.
description.russian: Пройдите игру с выключенным автоматическим подбиранием патронов.
description.spanish: Completa el juego con la opción de recoger la munición automáticamente deshabilitada.
description.turkish: 'Otomatik cephane toplama' seçeneği devre dışıyken ana hikâyeyi tamamla.

description.english: Complete the level "Steve's House" without firing a single shot.
description.german: Beende das Level "Steves Haus" ohne einen einzigen Schuss abzufeuern.
description.koreana: "스티브의 집" 레벨을 총을 쏘지 않고 완료.
description.russian: Пройдите уровень "Дом Стива" не выстрелив ни разу.
description.spanish: Completa el nivel "Casa de Steve" sin disparar ni una sola bala.
description.turkish: Hiç ateş etmeden "Steve'in Evi" bölümünü tamamla.

description.english: Unlock all unique weapons.
description.german: Schalte alle einzigartigen Waffen frei.
description.spanish: Desbloquea todas las armas únicas.
description.turkish: Tüm eşsiz silahların kilidini aç.

description.english: You must really enjoy pain. Finish the game on 'Masochist' difficulty.
description.german: Schmerz ist wohl dein Ding. Beende das Spiel auf dem 'Masochist' Schwierigkeitsgrad.
description.koreana: 당신 정말 고통을 즐기는 자로군요. 마조히스트 난이도로 게임 클리어.
description.russian: Вам, видимо, очень нравится боль. Завершите игру на сложности 'Мазохист'.
description.spanish: Debes disfrutar el dolor. Completa el juego en la dificultad 'Masoquista'.
description.turkish: Acıdan zevk alıyor olmalısın. Ana hikâyeyi 'Mazoşist' zorlukta tamamla.

description.english: Pass out from drinking too much.
description.german: Werde ohnmächtig vom zu viel trinken.
description.russian: Выпейте слишком много и потеряйте сознание.
description.spanish: Desmayate por beber más de la cuenta.
description.turkish: Çok fazla içki içip bilincini kaybet.

description.english: You really enjoy listening in on private matters, don't you?
description.german: Du findest es toll, bei Sachen zuzuhören, die dich nichts angehen, oder?
description.russian: Вам, видимо, очень нравится слушать личные дела других людей.
description.spanish: Disfrutas escuchando asuntos privados, ¿no es así?
description.turkish: İşi pişiren çiftleri gizlice dinlemek sence de ayıp değil mi?

description.english: Obtain a 100% accuracy rating with 40 or more shots fired.
description.german: Bekomme eine 100% Präzisionsbewertung mit 40 oder mehr abgefeuerten Schüssen.
description.russian: Достигните оценку меткости в 100% сделав 40 или больше выстрелов.
description.spanish: Obtén una puntuación del 100% en precisión después de disparar 40 veces o más.
description.turkish: 40 (veya daha fazla) el ateş edip %100 isabet oranıyla bir bölümü tamamla.
